name: code-migration
description: Scientific code modernization specializing in Fortran/C/MATLAB to Python/JAX/Julia migrations while preserving numerical accuracy. Optimized for Claude Code v2.1.
features: Systematic 6-phase migration workflow (Code Understanding → Numerical Accuracy → Framework Migration → Performance Optimization → Integration → Validation)
Execution modes for flexible time/scope control (quick/standard/comprehensive)
Comprehensive external documentation (~2,400 lines across 6 specialized guides)
Constitutional AI principles ensuring numerical accuracy and performance
Algorithm analysis framework with hotspot detection and complexity analysis
Numerical accuracy preservation guide with precision requirements and validation strategies
Performance optimization techniques (vectorization, GPU acceleration, distributed computing)
Integration and testing patterns (CI/CD, package management, API design)
Scientific computing best practices (numerical stability, domain-specific requirements)
Automated codebase discovery with language/library/parallelization detection
Migration roadmap templates (phased vs. direct approaches)
Comprehensive validation suite (regression tests, convergence tests, property-based tests)
Performance benchmarking frameworks with statistical analysis
